title: Trundle's ice pillar could use a good hitbox check.
body: Even remotely close to a wall or another champ/minion and your champ goes apeshit trying to find a crack in time to get around it, and it's far larger than the apparent model at a quick glace. (I know it technically occupies the little effects outside of the base of the pillar, but that's just silly for a game where reading skills quickly is needed)

replies.body:
No.
Just no.
Trundles pillar works when your champion's hitbox collides with the pillar's hitbox. It works. Bam. Boom. Done. 
There are countless other hitboxes that need much more work at the moment that are much more impactful and much more degenerate,
It just needs to look a bit different IMO. Yasuo wall on the other hand...

Pillar is fine. Please no more nerfs. 

The struggle in League of shields, CC and mobility is hard enough for him as it is.
